name: Women's Tree Dasher Relay
description: Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in color for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.

womens-tree-dasher-relay-blizzard.description: Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in colour for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.

localizedDescription.en-GB: Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in colour for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.
localizedDescription.en-US: Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in color for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: 地球に優しい素材を使ったスリップオンのランニングシューズ、Tree Dasher Relayが新登場。製造過程で残った糸を有効活用して紡いだ素材のため、一つとして同じ色味が無い、ユニークなシューズです。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Dasher Relay를 만나보세요. 지구 친화적인 소재로 만든 슬립온 스타일 러닝화입니다. 쓰고 남은 원재료를 재활용하여 만들었기에 모든 제품에 약간의 색상차이가 있습니다. 편하게 신을 수 있는 슬립온 퍼포먼스 러닝화를 신고 나가보세요.
localizedDescription.en-AU: Meet The Tree Dasher Relay — our laceless running shoe made from earth-friendly materials. Made from leftover stock yarns, each pair features slight variations in color for a one-of-a-kind design. Just slip ‘em on and get outside.
